titleStmt.title: Upon Mr. Bobard's yew-men of the guards to the physick garden to the tune of The counter-scuffle.
titleStmt.author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gayton by Wing. Ms. notes "Iuly 1662. By G.E. (ie) Edm. Geyton esq., Bedle of Acts [sic], Oxon."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
